title: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
text: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control., Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one —• Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature.• Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
